definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Wash the fruit, after waxing brighter color, appearance, pleasing to the eye.
sentences.chinese: 水果经清洗打蜡后色泽鲜丽，外观悦目。

sentences.english: we were meticulous in cleaning the car, washing and polishing every inch of it.
sentences.chinese: 我们小心翼翼地清洗汽车，将每一寸都冲洗和打蜡。

sentences.english: I dusted the table and then polished it with wax.
sentences.chinese: 我挥去桌上的灰尘然后打蜡。

sentences.english: Can you help me wax my car?
They waxed and buffed the floor .
sentences.chinese: 他们将地板打蜡并擦亮。

sentences.english: You don't get your legs waxed so why wax your vagina?
sentences.chinese: 你的腿也不打蜡为什么要给私处打蜡呢？

sentences.english: You don't get your legs waxed so why wax your vagina?
sentences.chinese: 你的腿也不打蜡为什么要给私处打蜡呢？

sentences.english: Nail waxing is a process that makes your nails shinny.
sentences.chinese: 指甲打蜡是为了让指甲光亮。

sentences.english: An optional waxer is available that replaces the standard infeed assembly.
sentences.chinese: 可选打蜡机可以代替标准的横向进磨装置。

sentences.english: Mark: I want my car to be washed exteriorly from top to bottom. Then wax the body of the car.
sentences.chinese: 我想把车的外部从上到下冲洗一遍，然后给车身打蜡。

sentences.english: CAR BODY: Protect your car's finish with a good waxing.
sentences.chinese: 清洗车身后在漆面上打蜡将使汽车的外观焕然一新。

sentences.english: Why doesn't Zig Zag suggest nail-waxing service?
sentences.chinese: 为什么这个那个不建议给指甲打蜡？

definition: to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
protective or tinted film (for LCD screens, car windows etc)/facial mask (cosmetics)
